projects.card.description: This repository contains the implementation of many popular and custom-designed natural language processing algorithms. A part of this repository is inspired by the problem-statements from the Natural Language Processing Specialization, a MOOC by DeepLearning.AI.

Solutions to all the exercises in the book Stanley B. Lippman, Jose Lajoie, and Barbara E. Moo. 2012. C++ Primer (5th. ed.). Addison-Wesley Professional. As opposed to merely giving the answers to questions, I've tried to provide an explanation supplemented examples wherever possible.

This repository contains the mathematical derivations and ground-up implementation  (i.e. without using any pre-built modules) of common deep-learning algorithms. A part of this repository is inspired by the problem-statements from the Deep Learning Specialization, a MOOC by DeepLearning.AI.

A stereo-vision system composed of two Raspberry Pi's each with an infrared camera module. The images are processed using the OpenCV library while a custom software is used for synchronizing the two cameras.
